Package brave.servlet

Class HttpServletResponseWrapper

java.lang.Object
brave.Response
brave.http.HttpResponse
brave.http.HttpServerResponse
brave.servlet.HttpServletResponseWrapper
public class HttpServletResponseWrapper
extends HttpServerResponse
This delegates to HttpServletResponse methods, taking care to portably handle statusCode().
Since:
5.10
